title: FSLuxembourg
label: INTERNATIONAL NGO
description: A humanitarian organization serving Luxembourg's multilingual community needed a website their non-technical team could confidently manage. We designed a custom content system for projects, research, and open calls across three languages, structured for clarity, speed, and long-term use. Fast, organized, and ready for their global work.

title: Stay Wild Travel
label: TRAVEL company
description: A new women's travel brand needed to launch quickly and test demand. From kickoff to live bookings in six weeks. The platform stayed simple, focused, and conversion-ready. First trips sold out within 48 hours.

title: Rana Hemdan
label: Artist Portfolio
description: An international artist with 200+ works spanning paintings, murals, and exhibitions needed a digital gallery that wouldn't compete with the art. We built a minimal system that loads fast, organizes decades of work, and disappears when you're looking at the pieces. The art is loud. The website is quiet.

title: Crescent
label: corporate
description: An insurance broker needed a bilingual corporate website that reflected a premium position and worked seamlessly in Arabic and English. Delivered in three weeks with full RTL support, high-end animation, and strong performance across markets. Mohanad is a true artist in the digital realm. With his magic touch, my website evolved into a captivating platform that tells my story effortlessly.
